Package net.edzard.kinetic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    Defines signature for drawing callbacks.
    FillStyle
    Markup interface for all fill styles
    Stage.DataUrlTarget
    Callback interface for receiveing a data URL string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Used to control animations.
    Box2d
    A data quadruple.
    Canvas  
    Circle
    A circular shape.
    Colour
    A RGBA colour value.
    Container
    Base class for all nodes that contain other child nodes.
    CustomShape
    A custom shape.
    Ellipse
    An elliptical shape.
    Frame
    Encapsulates timing information.
    GradientFillStyle
    Markup interface for all gradient fill styles.
    Group
    Enables grouping of nodes.
    Image
    An image shape.
    Kinetic
    Factory class for creating Kinetic objects.
    Layer
    A layer object.
    Line
    A line object.
    LinearGradientFillStyle
    A linear gradient fill style.
    MathTooling
    Math and Physics tooling.
    Node
    Base class for all of the Kinetic classes.
    Path
    Defines a path using a variety of drawing commands.
    PathSVG
    A shape that draws paths defined using the SVG standard
    PatternFillStyle
    A fill style using an image as a pattern.
    Polygon
    A polygon shape.
    RadialGradientFillStyle
    Radial gradient fill style.
    Rectangle
    A rectangular shape.
    RegularPolygon
    A regular polygon.
    Shadow
    Defines properties for a shadow.
    Shape
    Base class for all visible objects.
    Sprite
    A sprite shape.
    Stage
    Central class for drawing with Kinetic.
    Star
    A star shape.
    Text
    A text shape.
    TextPath
    A text path shape.
    Vector2d
    Stores a two-dimensional value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColourPalette
    A collection of predefined colours for your enjoyment.

    Defines the way that transitions take place.

    Line cap definitions.

    Pre-defined line styles.
    Node.Attr  
    Path.CommandType
    The type of a path command
    Rectangle.RectanglePoint
    Various points of interest.
    RepetitionType
    Defines the repetition of images when used as fill patterns.
    Shape.LineJoin
    Defines the way that to meeting lines are joined.
    Text.FontStyle
    Font style for a text.
    Text.HorizontalAlignment
    Horizontal alignment options for text.
    Text.VerticalAlignment
    Vertical alignment options for text.
